lead_paragraph: The minimum legal age for tobacco sales has emerged in recent years as a new front in the battle to curb smoking.

headline.main: Massachusetts, Like Boston, Weighs Raising Legal Age for Buying Cigarettes to 21
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts, Like Boston, Weighs Raising Legal Age for Buying Cigarettes to 21

snippet: The minimum legal age for tobacco sales has emerged in recent years as a new front in the battle to curb smoking.
